name: Sound Salad
description:
Sound Salad is a sound-object association game which trains concentration, attentive listening, imaginative and logical thinking.

Description
Through 8 levels, which are assembled out of 96 carefully crafted objects and sounds, young players are challenged to listen attentively to give each object back it’s proper sound.

Players are instantly rewarded with funny animations for each successful move as well as the gratitude of the upbeat Mr. Ear who is on his journey toward perfect sound harmony.

The degree of difficulty by which young ears, eyes and brains are put to the test can be adjusted from simple to sophisticated to the endless challenge of a speed game.

Due to the presence of various levels of difficulty Sound Salad is suitable even for children from 3 years and will grow with them up to primary school age, developing auditory perception , memory and logical thinking .

Content
- 8 Levels
- 96 objects
- 3 difficulty degrees with 2, 3 or 4 objects at a time
- Easy and Advanced mode
- a speed game: Play against the clock with endless flow of objects and their sound.


Dear Parents,
we are Moms and Dads to small children ourself. We take great care to design quality apps which are beneficial to kids development without compromising their privacy.

Benefits

Sound Salad trains the abilities of concentration, both imaginative and logical thinking as well as absorbing, processing and storing information.

Beyond this the app’s sound-object association tasks improve phonological awareness and perceptional skills which are are fundamental for language development and performing listening tasks.

This builds a good foundation for success in the classroom.

Child Friendly:

- easy navigation;
- no in-app purchase;
- parental gate;
- no third party advertising;
- no data collection;
- no integration with social networks;
